item.title: Simple Edits for Valentine＇s Day❤️
item.description: PhotoGrid provides loads of useful and elegant templates especially for Valentine's Day!! *{padding:0;margin:0;overflow:hidden}html,body{height:100%}img,span{position:absolute;width:100%;top:0;bottom:0;margin:auto}span{height:1.5em;text-align:center;font:48px/1.5 sans-serif;color:white;text-shadow:0 0 0.5em black}▶" frameborder="0" rel="0" style="position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border:0;" allowfullscreen title="Simple Edits for Valentine's Day❤️"
